code: @Test public void testGenericMessageToStringConversion() throws Exception {     GenericFileMessage<File> message = new GenericFileMessage<>(camelContext).     assertStringContains(message.toString(), "org.apache.camel.component.file.GenericFileMessage@").     GenericFile<File> file = new GenericFile<>(true).     file.setFileName("target/data/test.txt").     file.setFile(new File("target/data/test.txt")).     message = new GenericFileMessage<>(camelContext, file).     assertEquals(FileUtil.isWindows() ? "target\\test.txt" : "target/data/test.txt", message.toString()). }

@Test public void testGenericFileContentType() throws Exception {     GenericFile<File> file = new GenericFile<>(true).     file.setEndpointPath("target").     file.setFileName("target").     file.setFile(new File("target/camel-core-test.log")).     GenericFileMessage<File> message = new GenericFileMessage<>(camelContext, file).     file.populateHeaders(message, false).     assertEquals("Get a wrong file content type", "txt", message.getHeader(Exchange.FILE_CONTENT_TYPE)). }
